data.fullContent: The school board was worried that the English department wasn't doing a good enough job with the students. It was teaching grammar, writing, and literature with methods that were decades old. The school board commissioned a study to evaluate the effectiveness of the department. They realized that they needed to hire someone who could bring a fresh perspective to the department. They hired a new teacher, one who had graduated from a top university in Europe and had experience teaching English at colleges around the world. They also asked the other teachers to educate themselves about some of the newer approaches in the field. The school board decided that they would need to make some changes in order to keep up with the latest technology and teaching methods.

q1.translation: 学校董事会担心英语系在学生教育方面做得不够好。而是用几十年前的方法教语法、写作和文学。学校董事会委托进行一项研究，以评估该系的有效性。
q1.front: The school board was worried that the English department wasn't doing a good enough job with the students. It was teaching grammar, writing, and literature with methods that were decades old. The school board commissioned a study to evaluate the effectiveness of the department.
q1.content: The school board was worried ____ the English department wasn't doing a good enough ____ with the students. It was teaching grammar, writing, and literature with methods that were decades ____. The school ____ commissioned a ____ to evaluate the effectiveness of the department.

q2.translation: 学校董事会担心英语系在学生教育方面做得不够好。而是用几十年前的方法教语法、写作和文学。学校董事会委托进行一项研究，以评估该系的有效性。他们意识到他们需要雇佣一个能给部门带来新视角的人。他们聘请了一位新老师，这位老师毕业于欧洲顶级大学，在世界各地的大学教英语。他们还请其他老师自学一些该领域的新方法。学校董事会决定他们需要做一些改变，以跟上最新的技术和教学方法。

q2.middle: They realized that they needed to hire someone who could bring a fresh perspective to the department.
q2.ending: They hired a new teacher, one who had graduated from a top university in Europe and had experience teaching English at colleges around the world. They also asked the other teachers to educate themselves about some of the newer approaches in the field. The school board decided that they would need to make some changes in order to keep up with the latest technology and teaching methods.

options.sentence: Enrollment in the school had seen a dramatic increase since the early 2000's and now it was too crowded.
They realized that they needed to hire someone who could bring a fresh perspective to the department.

They started a campaign to make the school greener and more energy efficient for next year.

options.sentence: The school board implemented a plan to improve how well they taught English to the students.
The school board decided to hold an essay contest to encourage students to write about what was important in their lives.
The school board is hoping to replicate its English program at other schools in the coming months.
The principal has instituted a new policy that requires all of the students in grades three through eight to attend a weekly seminar.
